front.title: FYI on a Network Management Tool Catalog: Tools for Monitoring and Debugging TCP/IP Internets and Interconnected Devices

author.organization: University of Southern California, Information Sciences Institute

abstract.t: The goal of this FYI memo is to provide an update to FYI 2, RFC 1147, which provided practical information to site administrators and network managers. New and/or updated tools are listed in this RFC. Additonal descriptions are welcome, and should be sent to: noctools- entries@merit.edu.
